chapters.title: Chapter 52: Need
chapters.info: Gaidal Cain, p. 863 (783)—Hero of Legend, one of those called back by the Horn of Valere. He is always linked to Birgitte in the stories. Unlike her, Cain is not nearly as beautiful as he is said to be in the stories. Nynaeve thinks that he must be the ugliest man she has ever met in her life—his face is wide and flat, his heavy nose too big, his gash of a mouth too broad. See also Birgitte.
